Original: That request comes from the Outland
Count. It seems there has been a major
discovery at the Cloudy Stronghold.
[Page]
If you are interested, head to the
Grand Court and speak with the Count
directly. I await your swift return.
Translation: That request comes from the Outland
Count. It seems there has been a major
discovery at the Cloudy Stronghold.
[Page]
If you are interested, head to the
Grand Court and speak with the Count
directly. I await your swift return.

Original: Very good work. Another success to be
chalked up for your guild... or so
the Outland Count's man tells me.
[Page]
I have only heard tales of it from
explorers, but the Cloudy Stronghold
seems like an exotic place.
[Page]
It is beautiful, yet austere. What is
the word for it...? Melancholy? I am
sorry if any of this sounds strange.
[Page]
At any rate, here is the reward you
were promised.
Translation: Very good work. Another success to be
chalked up for your guild... or so
the Outland Count's man tells me.
[Page]
I have only heard tales of it from
explorers, but the Cloudy Stronghold
seems like an exotic place.
[Page]
It is beautiful, yet austere. What is
the word for it...? Melancholy? I am
sorry if any of this sounds strange.
[Page]
At any rate, here is the reward you
were promised.

Original: Ah, is this about my request? Thanks
to your opening the way to the Cloudy
Stronghold, we have begun exploring.
[Page]
And as a result, several documents
thought to belong to the Empire have
been found.
[Page]
But the documents are fragmented and
largely incomprehensible. Are you not
curious to know what they've found?
[Page]
I certainly am... And that is where
I need your help. First, allow me to
read one of the documents.
Translation: Ah, is this about my request? Thanks
to your opening the way to the Cloudy
Stronghold, we have begun exploring.
[Page]
And as a result, several documents
thought to belong to the Empire have
been found.
[Page]
But the documents are fragmented and
largely incomprehensible. Are you not
curious to know what they've found?
[Page]
I certainly am... And that is where
I need your help. First, allow me to
read one of the documents.

Original: "Discovery in [Color:5]Area 1 (D-2/4-5)[Color:0].
Discovery in [Color:5]Area 2 (C-3/2-5)[Color:0]."
That is all.
Translation: "Discovery in [Color:5]Area 1 (D-2/4-5)[Color:0].
Discovery in [Color:5]Area 2 (C-3/2-5)[Color:0]."
That is all.

Original: From the context, the bits about
be marking a location.
[Page]
I want you to find the locations cited
in this mysterious text. If you need a
moment here to ponder it, feel free.
Translation: From the context, the bits about
be marking a location.
[Page]
I want you to find the locations cited
in this mysterious text. If you need a
moment here to ponder it, feel free.

Original: Ah, have you made any breakthroughs
regarding the locations from that
document?
Translation: Ah, have you made any breakthroughs
regarding the locations from that
document?

Original: [Color:5]Have you figured it out?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Have you figured it out?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: I am confused... You go out of your
way to speak to me and then tell me
that you do not have an answer...
[Page]
I am glad for the company, but this
is no time for a chat. Now concentrate
and think carefully.
Translation: I am confused... You go out of your
way to speak to me and then tell me
that you do not have an answer...
[Page]
I am glad for the company, but this
is no time for a chat. Now concentrate
and think carefully.

Original: Of course. I shall read the document
once more. Listen carefully...
Translation: Of course. I shall read the document
once more. Listen carefully...

Original: Hmm... the "D-2" in "(D-2/4-5)" may
be a coordinate. I would have thought
you'd picked up on that by now.
[Page]
That must mean the similarly written
"4-5" is also a coordinate... Think
carefully, my friends!
Translation: Hmm... the "D-2" in "(D-2/4-5)" may
be a coordinate. I would have thought
you'd picked up on that by now.
[Page]
That must mean the similarly written
"4-5" is also a coordinate... Think
carefully, my friends!

Original: I am eager to hear your thoughts.
[Page]
This "[Color:5]Area 1[Color:0]" from the document...
Where do you think "[Color:5]D-2/4-5[Color:0]" is?
Translation: I am eager to hear your thoughts.
[Page]
This "[Color:5]Area 1[Color:0]" from the document...
Where do you think "[Color:5]D-2/4-5[Color:0]" is?

Original: I see... Then "[Color:5]Area 2[Color:0]"? Where do you
suppose "[Color:5]C-3/2-5[Color:0]" is?
Translation: I see... Then "[Color:5]Area 2[Color:0]"? Where do you
suppose "[Color:5]C-3/2-5[Color:0]" is?

Original: Ah, I see... Well, I shall send my
scouts there without delay.
Translation: Ah, I see... Well, I shall send my
scouts there without delay.

Original: My scouts have just returned with the
results of their investigation. First,
regarding Area 1...
Translation: My scouts have just returned with the
results of their investigation. First,
regarding Area 1...

Original: It was just as you said. A small, yet
distinct emblem was found at the
coordinates you provided!
[Page]
Moreover, the emblem was the Imperial
seal. I think it quite safe to say
that that is Area 1!
Translation: It was just as you said. A small, yet
distinct emblem was found at the
coordinates you provided!
[Page]
Moreover, the emblem was the Imperial
seal. I think it quite safe to say
that that is Area 1!

Original: Unfortunately, the location you gave
us had no distinct features or marks.
Translation: Unfortunately, the location you gave
us had no distinct features or marks.

Original: Now, as for Area 2...
Translation: Now, as for Area 2...

Original: Ah, wonderful! They found a very small
Imperial seal at the location you
pointed out!
[Page]
This must be the place the document
described. I am confident in thinking
that this is Area 2.
Translation: Ah, wonderful! They found a very small
Imperial seal at the location you
pointed out!
[Page]
This must be the place the document
described. I am confident in thinking
that this is Area 2.

Original: I am sorry, but they found no special
features or hints that the location
you gave us is Area 2.
Translation: I am sorry, but they found no special
features or hints that the location
you gave us is Area 2.

Original: Hmm... Based on this result, I cannot
call the request complete. Think back
to the document once more...
Translation: Hmm... Based on this result, I cannot
call the request complete. Think back
to the document once more...

Original: And so, we have pinpointed both Area 1
and Area 2! I'd expect nothing less
from Tharsis' best explorers!
[Page]
So those letters did, in fact, mark
the coordinates of a map.
[Page]
"(D-2/4-5)" must have meant the spot
within D-2 that is four down from the
top and five over from the left.
[Page]
This may come in handy the next time
we decipher an Imperial document...
Remember it well!
[Page]
I do believe that completes the task I
gave you! Go to the bar and make your
report. Thanks again, my friends!
Translation: And so, we have pinpointed both Area 1
and Area 2! I'd expect nothing less
from Tharsis' best explorers!
[Page]
So those letters did, in fact, mark
the coordinates of a map.
[Page]
"(D-2/4-5)" must have meant the spot
within D-2 that is four down from the
top and five over from the left.
[Page]
This may come in handy the next time
we decipher an Imperial document...
Remember it well!
[Page]
I do believe that completes the task I
gave you! Go to the bar and make your
report. Thanks again, my friends!

Original: So we know both locations now, but...
I wonder what their significance
could be...
Translation: So we know both locations now, but...
I wonder what their significance
could be...

Original: You arrive at the spot you guessed at
to confirm the coordinates from the
Imperial document.
Translation: You arrive at the spot you guessed at
to confirm the coordinates from the
Imperial document.

Original: You land and thoroughly search the
area, finally finding a very small
emblem that seems to be a symbol.
[Page]
You would never have noticed it if
not for the coordinates. It is some
sort of sign! The Count must know...
Translation: You land and thoroughly search the
area, finally finding a very small
emblem that seems to be a symbol.
[Page]
You would never have noticed it if
not for the coordinates. It is some
sort of sign! The Count must know...

Original: You are sure that the Outland Count's
document indicated that there should
be some sort of sign here...
[Page]
But for now, you can find no reason
to linger, and you therefore depart
on your skyship.
Translation: You are sure that the Outland Count's
document indicated that there should
be some sort of sign here...
[Page]
But for now, you can find no reason
to linger, and you therefore depart
on your skyship.
